data.title: Niantic Beyond Reality: Black Developers Initiative – Niantic
data.meta_description: Niantic’s Black Developers Initiative is a program established to support, mentor and finance Black game development teams for the purpose of building real-world AR games.
data.text:
To confirm your interest in the Spring 2021 cohort of the Niantic Beyond Reality: Black Developers Initiative, please complete the following form no later than Sunday, March 14th, 2021 11:59 PM PT. Until then, if you run into any issues with this form, you can reach us at bdi@nianticlabs.com. Applications submitted after the date mentioned above may be considered for a future cohort of the Niantic Beyond Reality: Black Developers Initiative.

If your team seems like a fit for the Beyond Reality: Black Developers Initiative, we'll invite you to submit a game pitch. Either way, we'll be in touch within a few weeks. We look forward to seeing what amazing projects you have underway, and how we can empower you and your team!

A note from our Legal team: You acknowledge that Niantic may now or in the future independently develop or purchase products or services related to or similar to the projects you describe in this RFI. You recognize that Niantic's employees or contractors may retain in their unaided memories information in your RFI ("Residuals"). Niantic may use Residuals for any purpose, including use in Niantic products and services.
